intro.s1: You want to MINT your GFA Insignia and join the largest Froggy community on Aavegotchi ? You are at the right place !
intro.s2: GFA collection's Insigna #4 is available in a limited edition. Don't miss this opportunity to get it and at the same time to support the work of the guild members !
intro.bullets: A lot of benefits are coming with it:
intro.bullets1: Access to exclusive dedicated discord channels for GFA members
intro.bullets2: Own a voting power to participate in our Guild community votes
intro.bullets3: Exclusive participation access to GFA private raffles
intro.bullets4: Benefits in the futur contests to come (Crew3, Sandbox, ...)
intro.bullets5: Access granted to the futur GFA lodge in the gotchiverse for the Communal Channeling
